A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: Read some real reviews (not paid critic reviews) and was debating about even seeing this\, but scored some free tickets so figured what the heck. I want my three hours back! I thought JarJar was the nail in the coffin for the star wars franchise\, but oh nooooo this has definitely been that nail. from bombs that drop in space (hello gravity?) to the horrible comic relief (if you call it that) with Gen Hux at the beginning\, the horrible political undertones of the movie I wish I could give this steaming pile of donkey poo a 1/4 star. The only reason it gets a high school is merely for the final scene when the ship went to light speed\, that was pretty epic visually.
